metadata.name: Sierra de Manantlán
metadata.governance: Federal or national ministry or agency
metadata.management_authority: Ministry of the Environment and Natural Resources through the National Commission of Natural Protected Areas
metadata.designaciones_internacionales: UNESCO Reserva de la Biosfera MAB

water_stress.source: WRI Aqueduct Water Risk Atlas V4

interpretation.BWS: Ratio of total water withdrawals to available supply. Protected areas often show 'No Data' due to minimal human water use.

interpretation.agbd: Aboveground Biomass Density in Megagrams (tonnes) per hectare
interpretation.total_carbon: Rough estimate of total aboveground carbon stock in megatonnes

heat_stress.note: Tropical nights estimated from mean minimum temperature

drought_indicators.note: Drought indicators estimated from mean precipitation patterns

interpretation.irs_index: Social Lag Index: negative values = low lag (better conditions), positive = high lag (worse conditions)
interpretation.categories: Muy bajo (best) → Bajo → Medio → Alto → Muy alto (worst)
interpretation.weighted_mean: Population-weighted average across all municipalities intersecting ANP
